code: import DecisionConstantsFE from"utils/constants/DecisionConstantsFE";var HIT_COLOR="rgba(34, 181, 73, 0.7)";var STAND_COLOR="rgba(247, 103, 0, 0.7)";var SURRENDER_HIT_COLOR="rgba(196, 43, 43, 0.7)";var SURRENDER_STAND_COLOR="rgba(143, 19, 209, 0.7)";var DOUBLE_COLOR="rgba(33, 70, 219, 0.7)";var SPLIT_COLOR="rgba(20, 181, 186, 0.7)";var SPLIT_DOUBLE_COLOR="rgba(176, 31, 181, 0.7)";var DOUBLE_STAND_COLOR="rgba(40, 154, 224, 0.7)";var BACKGROUND_COLORS={};BACKGROUND_COLORS[DecisionConstantsFE.HIT]={backgroundColor:HIT_COLOR};BACKGROUND_COLORS[DecisionConstantsFE.STAND]={backgroundColor:STAND_COLOR};BACKGROUND_COLORS[DecisionConstantsFE.SURRENDER_HIT]={backgroundColor:SURRENDER_HIT_COLOR};BACKGROUND_COLORS[DecisionConstantsFE.SURRENDER_STAND]={backgroundColor:SURRENDER_STAND_COLOR};BACKGROUND_COLORS[DecisionConstantsFE.DOUBLE]={backgroundColor:DOUBLE_COLOR};BACKGROUND_COLORS[DecisionConstantsFE.SPLIT]={backgroundColor:SPLIT_COLOR};BACKGROUND_COLORS[DecisionConstantsFE.SPLIT_DOUBLE]={backgroundColor:SPLIT_DOUBLE_COLOR};BACKGROUND_COLORS[DecisionConstantsFE.DOUBLE_STAND]={backgroundColor:DOUBLE_STAND_COLOR};var ColorConstants={HIT_COLOR:HIT_COLOR,SURRENDER_HIT_COLOR:SURRENDER_HIT_COLOR,SURRENDER_STAND_COLOR:SURRENDER_STAND_COLOR,DOUBLE_COLOR:DOUBLE_COLOR,BACKGROUND_COLORS:BACKGROUND_COLORS};export default ColorConstants;
